title: BRIEF-Spur Corp Says Total Interest In Securities Held By Long4Life In Co Has Increased To 12.5%
text:
BRIEF-Spur Corp Says Total Interest In Securities Held By Long4Life In Co Has Increased To 12.5%

Stock Markets 24 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Spur Corp Says Total Interest In Securities Held By Long4Life In Co Has Increased To 12.5% Oct 8 (Reuters) - Spur Corporation Ltd : * JSE: SUR - DISCLOSURE OF AN ACQUISITION OF SECURITIES IN SPUR CORPORATION * SPUR CORPORATION - TOTAL INTEREST IN SECURITIES HELD BY LONG4LIFE HAS INCREASED TO 12.5% OF TOTAL ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF CO
